price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Ni ukuri Twebwe Allah, Tworoheje Qor’ani mu rurimi rwawe rw’icarabu; kugira uyikoreshe mu gushikiriza inkuru nziza ihumuriza abagamburukiramana, ko bazohabwa Ubwami bw’ijuru, no mu kugabisha abantu b’inshirwarimenetse mu bigaba ku bihano vy’Imana Allah.
arabic: فَإِنَّمَا يَسَّرۡنَٰهُ بِلِسَانِكَ لِتُبَشِّرَ بِهِ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ وَتُنذِرَ بِهِۦ قَوۡمٗا لُّدّٗا

meta.transliteration: fa-innamā yassarnāhu bilisānika litubashira bihi al-mutaqīna watundhira bihi qawman luddan
translations: that you may give glad tidings
